arts.ttl: Ligue 1 manager sacked after Roberto De Zerbi humiliation as president makes stunning TV statement
arts.sum: The president of Ligue 1 strugglers Montpellier HSC announces the sacking of head coach Michel Der Zakarian on live TV following their 5-0 loss to Marseille.

arts.ttl: Ex-Man United star Mason Greenwood scores AGAIN for Marseille as Roberto De Zerbi's side return to winning ways with thumping 5-0 victory at Montpellier
arts.sum: Roberto De Zerbi's side led 3-0 when Greenwood breezed past a defender with step overs before unleashing a powerful shot past the goalkeeper with his right foot just before the hour mark.

arts.ttl: Montpellier’s Michel Der Zakarian dismissed following 5-0 home loss against Marseille
arts.sum: Montpellier head coach Michel Der Zakarian has been relieved of his duties following La Paillade‘s 5-0 home defeat at the hands of Marseille. Montpellier are sitting bottom of the Ligue…

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Montpellier 0-5 Marseille: Return to winning ways for Les Phocéens ahead of Le Classique
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Round 8, 20/10/2024 For the second week running, Olympique de Marseille would be facing off against Ligue 1’s bottom-placed team. However, unlike the 1-1 draw against Angers…

arts.ttl: Lyon maintains good form with a 4-0 win at Le Havre before Marseille plays Montpellier
arts.sum: Toulouse drew 1-1 with Angers in a basement battle, with Norway forward Joshua King equalizing for the home side in the second half following striker Ibrahima Niane’s early goal for Angers. Lyon made it five straight wins in all competitions with a dominant 4-0 victory at Le Havre to move up to seventh place in the French league on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Montpellier XI v Marseille: Benjamin Lecomte to return in goal amid injury crisis
arts.sum: Montpellier HSC are a team in crisis and look likely to be embroiled in a relegation battle throughout the campaign. Injuries to key players won’t help them, but that is…

arts.ttl: What could unlock Elye Wahi’s potential at Marseille?
arts.sum: Olympique de Marseille supporters are still waiting to see the club’s investment in Elye Wahi (21) pay off. Coming to OM during the summer transfer window from RC Lens…

arts.ttl: French league condemns homophobic chants made by PSG fans about Marseille and Rabiot
arts.sum: “These new discriminatory chants made by Paris Saint-Germain supporters are unacceptable when, at the same time, the whole of professional soccer has been working to ban homophobic behavior and chants from stadiums,” the league, known as LFP, said in a statement. The French soccer league has condemned homophobic chants made by some Paris Saint-Germain fans during the home game against Strasbourg on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Marseille predicted XI vs Montpellier: English duo Jonathan Rowe and Mason Greenwood to start
arts.sum: Olympique de Marseille will be hoping to return to winning ways after the pause in club football. Before the international break, Les Olympiens were left frustrated following a 1-1 draw…

arts.ttl: Mason Greenwood hoping for Thomas Tuchel talks ahead of possible England return
arts.sum: Mason Greenwood hasn't played for England for four years but hopes that the arrival of Thomas Tuchel could present him with a fresh slate as he looks to add to his one international cap
